page.title: 17SHOPPING
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN THIS AREA SHOP IN GREENOCK TOWN CENTRE WHICH HAS A VARIETY OF LARGE SHOPS AND SUPERMARKETS. PEOPLE SOMETIMES TRAVEL TO GLASGOW TO SHOP.GOUROCK SHOPPING CENTRE HAS MANY SMALL SHOPS WHICH PROVIDE A GOOD SERVICE BUT LACK VARIETY AND CHOICE. MANY PEOPLE NOW BUY IN BULK AT A 'HYPERMARKET' TO SAVE MONEY AND SHOPPING TRIPS.THESE ARE OUTWITH THE AREA AND PEOPLE TRAVEL BY CAR TO THEM.MANY WOULD LIKE TO SEE A LARGE SUPERMARKET IN GOUROCK TO SAVE TRAVELLING. PRICES IN MOST SHOPS TODAY ARE VERY COMPETITIVE.
